#summary Software required to use the package.

To translate code, java2python requires the following:

  * [http://www.python.org/ python] [http://www.python.org/download/releases/2.5/ 2.5] or newer
  * [http://www.antlr.org/ antlr] [http://www.antlr.org/download.html 2.7.x] (3.x series untested)

Output code requires python 2.5, and does not require ANTLR.
